mapper.select: SELECT r.reviewno,r.ptno,TO_CHAR(r.regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')as "regDate",r.score,r.content, p.userno,p.trainerno,s.schedulecount,u.name,u.profileImg FROM review r,pt p,(SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule group by ptNo)s,users u where r.ptno = p.ptno and p.ptno = s.ptno and u.userno = p.userno and p.trainerno= #{no} ORDER BY regDate DESC

SELECT p.userno,p.trainerno,s.schedulecount,u.name FROM pt p,(SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule group by ptNo)s,users u where p.ptno = s.ptno and u.userno = p.userno and p.userno= #{no}
